definition: not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Then, Mr. Sun Ta-lun presented the second report on Futurology.
sentences.chinese: 接著，第二篇由孫大倫先生報告《未來學》。

sentences.english: Marxist's dialectics is the methodology of the futurology.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思主義辯證法是未來學的方法論。

sentences.english: Finally, this paper explains the application of futurology in the budgeting control.
sentences.chinese: 文章最後簡要說明了未來學在預算控制中的運用。

sentences.english: An animated depiction of Pangea Ultima demonstrates a bold exercise in futuristic thinking.
sentences.chinese: 動畫呈現終極盤古大陸顯示，未來學想法的大膽運作。

sentences.english: First chapter introduces the relationship between budgeting management and futurology.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分首先介紹了預算管理與未來學的關係。
